docTitle.titlePart:
Two Potential Solution for an Abelian Dyon in Born lnfeld
Theory

byline.affiliation: Department of Physics, North Adams State College,

front.div:
Abstract
By introducing two potentials to describe the electromagnetic field we
arrive at a symmetric solution for the field of an Abelian dyon in Born
Infeld theory. A discussion is given regarding the difference between a two
potential theory and a one potential theory in the case of an Abelian dyon.
